All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BiteOptions
BiteOptions is an entity that represents a set of options that are implemented by a enum.
BiteOptions.Option
Enum represents the different operations that can be performed.
ChatClient
This class overrides some of the methods defined in the abstract superclass in order to give more functionality to the client.
ChatIF
This interface implements the abstract method used to display objects onto the client or server UIs.
ClientController
This class constructs the UI for a chat client.
ClientInfo
The ClientInfo class represents information about a client, including its host name, IP address, and status.
ClientUI
 
CreateNewCustomerController
Controller class for creating a new user in the application.
Customer
Represents a Customer entity with various attributes.
DBController
DBController class handles all database-related operations such as connecting to the database, retrieving and updating records, and managing database transactions.
EchoServerPro
The EchoServerPro class is responsible for handling client requests and server operations.
LogInUserController
Controller class for handling user login functionality in the BiteMe application.
MainPagesClientController
Controller class for the main client page.
MainPagesMangerController
Controller class for managing the main pages of the manager's interface.
MainPageSupplierController
Controller class for the main page of the supplier's interface.
MenuItem
Represents a menu item in a restaurant's menu, from the Supplier's view.
MenuItems
Represents a menu item in a restaurant's menu, from the Customer's view.
NewItemFormController
Controller class for handling the creation and editing of menu items in the supplier interface.
OrderInProgressController
Controller class for handling the Order In Progress screen.
Restaurant
Represents a Restaurant entity with various attributes.
RestaurantOrders
The class represents an order made at a restaurant.
RestaurantSelectionController
Controller class for the restaurant selection screen in the application.
SelectFromRestMenuController
Controller class for the restaurant menu selection screen.
SelectFromRestMenuController.CartItem
 
ServerPortFrameControllerPro
Controller class for managing the server port frame GUI.
ServerUIPro
The class serves as the main entry point for the server-side application.
StartOrderController
Controller class for handling the Start Order GUI.
Supplier_OrderManagementController
Controller class for managing orders for a supplier in the restaurant's management GUI.
SupplierEditItamController
Controller class for managing and editing supplier menu items.
SupplyConfigurationController
Controller class for handling the supply configuration view in the GUI.
User
Represents a User entity with various attributes such as userId, username, password, email, etc.
